job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: A Software Development company is looking for a Site Reliability Engineer to join their team on a full-time Direct Hire basis. You’d be joining a team of unique problem solvers with a multitude of skills and perspectives. You’ll be responsible for taking the lead on relevant projects while surrounded by people who will provide support and mentorship.  As a Site Reliability Engineer, you’ll mainly be focused on running better production application and systems, creating a strict engineering discipline and utilizing software and systems to help find creative engineering solutions to operational problems. Applicants must be currently authorized to work in the United States on a full-time basis now and in the future. Connor Bowles
